item.title: Engsci Y2S1 Exam Review
item.description: Exam ‘cheat sheets’ for EngSci 2nd year semester fall semester. These were made as part of my own studying for the exams. As 3/6 of my exams were cancelled due to the omicron covid variant, AER210, MAT292, and PHY293 are missing. I do not guarantee content correctness – but if you find a mistake, please let me know! Table of Contents CHE260 Variables Heat Transfer Mechanisms Steady Heat Transfer Transient Heat Transfer Forced Convection Heat Transfer Radiation Heat Transfer ECE253: Digital and Computer Systems Logic and Circuits Verilog ARM Assembly MAT292 AER210 PHY293 ESC203 CHE260 Note: the following only contains materials for the final exam, so it will only cover the heat-transfer portion of CHE260.
